issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h6. Description
No specific dimensions and naming convention is given by Appcelerator for splash screen landscape mode support for iphone 4/4s, iPhone 5/5C/5S and iPhone 6. 
Dimensions and filenames are provided for iPhone 6+ devices to for splash screen support in landscape mode and its working. 

Please find the below link, 

http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Icons_and_Splash_Screens-section-29004897_IconsandSplashScreens-iOSgraphicassetrequirementsandoptions

I have created the new project in Appcelerator which provides default set of images used for App icons and splash images. While running this project the splash screen opens in portrait mode only in iPhone 4/4s, 5/ 5s/ 5c and 6.
fields.summary: iOS: Splash screen image naming conventions is not available for iOS(4/4s, iPhone 5/5C/5S and iPhone 6) in landscape mode.

comments.body: If I remember correctly, there's no support from Apple for landscape splash screens for all iPhone / iPod devices, EXCEPT iPhone 6 plus and iPhone 6s plus.
